lead_paragraph: STAMLER--Lillian Spitzer, 96, of Stony Creek, CT, wife of the late Judge Joseph H. Stamler, passed away peacefully at home on May 27, 2016 surrounded by family. She was born June 13, 1919 in Brooklyn to Benjamin and Beatrice Salzman Spitzer. Lillian is survived by two sons: Joseph H. Stamler, Jr., 74 and his wife Ann of Fairfield, CT and S. Paul Stamler, 69 of Stony Creek, along with Paul's children, Abbi, Reed and Teddy Stamler, and a sister, Jean Krosner. A private graveside service was planned at the family plot in Stony Creek Cemetery. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made to CT Hospice Home Care, 100 Double Beach Road, Branford, CT 06405, or The Seeing Eye, PO Box 375, Morristown, NJ 07963-0375. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  STAMLER, LILLIAN SPITZER
